title: Hamptons Houses Now Luxury Bunkers...
description: Hamptons Houses Now Luxury Bunkers... (Top headline, 5th story, link ) Related stories: New Yorkers who break distancing rules face $500 fine... Record number of 911 calls... UPDATE: Field hospital set up in Central Park... Dead bodies loaded into trucks... D…
content: (Bloomberg Opinion) -- Not long after my family and I left New York City to wait out the coronavirus crisis from our house in the Hamptons, the broker who sold it to us a decade ago called my wife, Dawn. She wanted to know where we were planning to self-isola… [+8019 chars]
